heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_pangolier
heroes.bio_loc:
The men and women that make up the Nivan Gallants live a life of swordplay, chandelier swinging, and tawdry romance. And while all adhere to their creed that “A life of adventure is the only life worth living,” the exploits of Donté Panlin still manage to raise the eyebrows of even the most hedonistic of swordsmen.

There is no monster he won’t slay. No creature he won’t woo. No tyrant he won’t stand against. And no noble immune to his silver tongue.
heroes.hype_loc: Eager to dash into danger at a moment's notice, the Pangolier thrives on disrupting enemy movements and placing himself in the midst of chaos. Artfully guiding his blade between cracks in armor and shrugging off attacks with his protective scales, this graceful swordsman is always ready to roll into battle.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Dashes and rolls in to disrupt enemy movements

facets.description_loc: Pangolier can double jump with Shield Crash dealing more damage and gaining more barrier.
facets.name: pangolier_double_jump

facets.description_loc: Rolling Thunder movement and turn speed increased, but duration is decreased.
facets.name: pangolier_thunderbolt

abilities.name: pangolier_swashbuckle
abilities.desc_loc:
Pangolier dashes along the target line, then slashes all enemies in the drawn direction with several quick swipes.

Lucky Shot has a chance to activate from this damage.
abilities.lore_loc: The Pangolier's blade is even nimbler than his tongue.

abilities.name: pangolier_shield_crash
abilities.desc_loc:
Pangolier jumps in the air and slams back to the ground in front of his current position, damaging and slowing all enemies in a radius. For each enemy hero hit, he gains an all damage shield for a short time.

Forward movement is maintained if Shield Crash is used while Rolling Thunder is active, and allows Rolling Thunder to clear walls or cliffs.

 Shield Crash cooldown during Rolling Thunder is decreased.
abilities.lore_loc: Only in the midst of his enemies does the Pangolier truly thrive.
abilities.scepter_loc: Causes Shield Crash to cast a 2-attack Swashbuckle every 90 degrees around your hero.
facets_loc: Pangolier can cast Shield Crash a second time mid-flight, dealing more damage and gaining more barrier.

abilities.name: pangolier_lucky_shot
abilities.desc_loc: Pangolier rolls the dice and lets fate decide the outcome for his enemies. Grants a chance to drastically slow their attack speed and reduce armor on any damage dealt by Pangolier's attacks or abilities.
abilities.lore_loc: The Pangolier's blade is guided more often by whim than reason.

abilities.name: pangolier_fortune_favors_the_bold
abilities.desc_loc: Random item and ability effects of enemies near Pangolier have a reduced chance to affect him.
notes_loc: Applies to hero abilities and items.
Effect is a relative reduction in chance for effects to happen.

abilities.name: pangolier_rollup
abilities.desc_loc: Pangolier curls into an immobile protective ball, gaining debuff immunity, %magic_resistance%%% magic resistance, and allowing him to turn. Can be cast during Rolling Thunder to temporarily hit the brakes. Can cast Rolling Thunder and Shield Crash during Roll Up. If enemies attack Pangolier during this, he will roll away from the attacker, applying Rolling Thunder damage/stun if there are enemies in the way.

abilities.name: pangolier_gyroshell
abilities.desc_loc:
Pangolier curls into a debuff immune ball with %magic_resistance%%% additional magic resistance and rolls out. When rolling, he moves at an increased speed and can move through trees, but has a decreased ability to turn. Striking enemies knocks them back, inflicting damage proportional to his attack damage and stunning them when they land. 

Colliding with walls or cliffs will cause a temporary pause while Pangolier reverses in direction.

 During Rolling Thunder, Shield Crash cooldown is reduced.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.lore_loc: Where his ancestors sought only refuge, the Pangolier saw opportunity...
notes_loc: Enemies can be stunned multiple times per use, but cannot be affected a subsequent time until the previous stun duration ends.
If Pangolier is disabled while rolling, he will continue to stun and knock enemies that come within range.
facets_loc: Rolling Thunder movement and turn speed increased, but duration is decreased.
